item.title:
$TSLA - TESLA EARNINGS SET TO SPARK BIG MOVE
Traders are bracing for major volatility after Tesla reports earnings Tuesday after the close. Options markets are pricing in a 9.7% swing, up or down, according to ORATS.
Tesla shares slid another 6% Monday, dragged down by trade-war fears. The stock is now down over 44% YTD, weighed by consumer backlash, Elon Muskâ€™s ties to Trump, and a broader risk-off market. (From Walter Bloomberg)
item.description:
$TSLA - TESLA EARNINGS SET TO SPARK BIG MOVE

Traders are bracing for major volatility after Tesla reports earnings Tuesday after the close. Options markets are pricing in a 9.7% swing, up or down, according to ORATS.

Tesla shares slid another 6% Monday, dragged down by trade-war fears. The stock is now down over 44% YTD, weighed by consumer backlash, Elon Muskâ€™s ties to Trump, and a broader risk-off market.
